unnormalised: Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Brand Collabs Go Wild!
normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Brand Collabs Go Wild!

unnormalised: Okay, people, brand collaborations are officially everywhere! Seems like every day we're seeing another Insta post featuring some bizarre but brilliant partnership. Remember when Haldiram's teamed up with a streetwear brand for a limited-edition bhujia-themed hoodie? Genius!
normalised: Okay, people, brand collaborations are officially everywhere! Seems like every day we're seeing another Insta post featuring some bizarre but brilliant partnership. Remember when Haldiram's teamed up with a streetwear brand for a limited-edition bhujia-themed hoodie? Genius!

unnormalised: This week, Pooja Verma, the Delhi fashion influencer, is promoting a new line of eco-friendly sarees by Fabindia. She styled them with junk jewelry and even cooked up some delicious biryani while wearing one! Talk about relatable content.
normalised: This week, Pooja Verma, the Delhi fashion influencer, is promoting a new line of eco-friendly sarees by Fabindia. She styled them with junk jewelry and even cooked up some delicious biryani while wearing one! Talk about relatable content.

unnormalised: Then there's IIT Bombay partnering with Swiggy for a hackathon to improve delivery times – because who wants to wait longer for their midnight maggi fix? Seriously innovative! Experts predict brand spends on influencer collabs will jump by 30% this festive season, especially around Onam. With potential reach and ROI like this, brands are willing to shell out the Rs. to get noticed. Expect more quirky collaborations coming your way, folks! Get ready for the brand collab craziness!
